definition: to control (the course of sth)/to guide (a missile)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: A new reentry guidance algorithm for RLV(reusable launching vehicle) is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种针对可重复使用运载器的再入制导算法。

sentences.english: In order to attack the target with big impact angle, over compensation of gravity is added to the design.
sentences.chinese: 为了实现大落角攻击目标，进行了末制导过重补设计。

sentences.english: It has its own infrared seeker, guidance system, and motor.
sentences.chinese: 它也拥有自己的红外制导头，制导系统以及跟踪器。

sentences.english: It has its own infrared seeker, guidance system, and motor.
sentences.chinese: 它也拥有自己的红外制导头，制导系统以及跟踪器。

sentences.english: The method to generate assemblers by syntax-directed translation is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了语法制导翻译用于自动构造汇编程序的方法。

sentences.english: This method may allow simple guidance with less complex sensors for low-cost soft landing on the lunar surface.
sentences.chinese: 这种制导方法测量简单，适于低成本的软着陆任务。

sentences.english: The Laser guided weapon plays more and more roles in the war today.
sentences.chinese: 激光制导武器在现代战争中发挥着越来越重要的作用。

sentences.english: Simulation software of integrated guidance for long-range winged missile is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了研制的远程飞航导弹组合制导仿真软件。

sentences.english: Such problems can be avoided if the serialization is guided by a schema.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用模式制导的序列化，则可以避免这类问题。

sentences.english: The wire guidance enables torpedo to close into homing contact with the target.
sentences.chinese: 有线制导能够使鱼雷接近致自导引触及目标。

sentences.english: Finally, the TGM with Combined Guidance are introduce.
sentences.chinese: 最后介绍采用复合制导体制的末制导炮弹。

sentences.english: Finally, the TGM with Combined Guidance are introduce.
sentences.chinese: 最后介绍采用复合制导体制的末制导炮弹。

sentences.english: In this paper, the guidance scheme of reentry vehicles attacking slowly moving targets on the sea is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了再入飞行器攻击海上慢速活动目标的制导方案。

sentences.english: It is presented an effective approach for computing the basic firing data of missiles.
sentences.chinese: 实现了一种基于摄动制导的弹道导弹的发射诸元算法。

sentences.english: The data fusion algorithm used in TVM guidance is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了TVM制导下的数据融合算法。

sentences.english: Some aspects about guidance for genuine MIRV is mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论有关全导式分导制导的若干问题。

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)
